meanings.definition: A title of the Ottoman Empire, equivalent to emperor.
meanings.sent1: The padishahs of the Ottoman Empire were powerful rulers.
meanings.sent2: The ancient padishahs were respected by their people.
meanings.sent3: The padishahs decided to have a grand feast to celebrate their victory.
meanings.sent4: In the land of imagination, the padishahs ruled over the kingdom of dreams.
meanings.sent5: Legends spoke of the padishahs with awe and reverence.

meanings.sent1: The wise padishahs governed their kingdom with fairness.
meanings.sent2: The padishahs held court in the grand palace.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous jester played a prank on the unsuspecting padishahs.
meanings.sent4: The padishahs' influence spread far and wide like ripples in a pond.
meanings.sent5: The golden crown on the padishahs' head gleamed in the sunlight.
